description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in LogicHunt OWL Carousel – WordPress Owl Carousel Slider allows Stored XSS.This issue affects OWL Carousel – WordPress Owl Carousel Slider: from n/a through 1.4.0.

product.name: OWL Carousel – WordPress Owl Carousel Slider
